chapters.title: Chapter 2:  Questions of Leadership
chapters.info: Lord Captain Brandel Vordarian, p. 71—A Child of the Light. He is a blond hulk of a man from Andor. He stood with Asunawa. He is now the oldest of the Lords Captain serving under Galad. He is clean-shaven. His hair has a silver wash to it. He is described as “an enormous square of a man.” His family members are minor nobles who had been involved in Tigraine's court.
